td6.logic

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameImpl

    public interface Game
    Game interface to move pacman and play in a level

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compute(int direction)
      Called by view to do one "turn" : - Move PacMan in the required direction - Check if PacMan hit any other entity - Move Ghosts - Check if PacMan hit any other entity again
      int getDirection()
      Getter for direction
      int getHighestScore()
      Getter for highest score
      int getHpPacMan()
      Get PacMan's HP
      int[][] getMaze()
      Get a 2D array representing the maze (the current level) Values contained : - 0 WallImpl - 1 Gomme on CorridorImpl - 2 Fruit on CorridorImpl - 3 GhostDoorImpl - 4 Empty CorridorImpl - 4 (default)
      int getScore()
      Getter for score of pacman
      int getXPacMan()
      Get x coordinate of PacMan
      int getYPacMan()
      Get y coordinate of PacMan
      boolean isGameWon()
      Return true if the game is won
      boolean isLevelPassed()
      Return true if a level was passed last turn
      boolean isPacManDead()
      Return true if PacMan has no HP left (PacMan.hp = 0)
      void moveDOWN()
      move the pacman down
      void moveLEFT()
      move the pacman left
      void moveRIGHT()
      move the pacman right
      void moveUP()
      move the pacman up
      void setDirection(int direction)
      Setter for direction attribute

    • Method Detail

      • moveUP

        void moveUP()
        move the pacman up
        Postconditions :
        pacman.y = pacman.y_old and (pacman.x = pacman.x_old or pacman.x = pacman.x_old - 1)

      • moveRIGHT

        void moveRIGHT()
        move the pacman right
        Postconditions :
        pacman.x = pacman.x_old and (pacman.y = pacman.y_old or pacman.y = pacman.y_old + 1)

      • moveDOWN

        void moveDOWN()
        move the pacman down
        Postconditions :
        pacman.y = pacman.y_old and (pacman.x = pacman.x_old or pacman.x = pacman.x_old + 1)

      • moveLEFT

        void moveLEFT()
        move the pacman left
        Postconditions :
        pacman.x = pacman.x_old and (pacman.y = pacman.y_old or pacman.y = pacman.y_old - 1)

      • getScore

        int getScore()
        Getter for score of pacman
        Returns:
        value[|address] of score

      • getHighestScore

        int getHighestScore()
        Getter for highest score
        Returns:
        value[|address] of highest score

      • getDirection

        int getDirection()
        Getter for direction
        Returns:
        value of the direction

      • setDirection

        void setDirection(int direction)
        Setter for direction attribute
        Parameters:
        direction - new direction (1 = UP / 2 = RIGHT / 3 = DOWN / 4 = LEFT)

      • getMaze

        int[][] getMaze()
        Get a 2D array representing the maze (the current level) Values contained : - 0 WallImpl - 1 Gomme on CorridorImpl - 2 Fruit on CorridorImpl - 3 GhostDoorImpl - 4 Empty CorridorImpl - 4 (default)
        Returns:
        2D array containing int values corresponding to case type/entity.ies

      • compute

        void compute(int direction)
        Called by view to do one "turn" : - Move PacMan in the required direction - Check if PacMan hit any other entity - Move Ghosts - Check if PacMan hit any other entity again
        Parameters:
        direction - direction in which to move PacMan

      • getXPacMan

        int getXPacMan()
        Get x coordinate of PacMan
        Returns:
        x coordinate of PacMan

        int getYPacMan()
        Get y coordinate of PacMan
        Returns:
        y coordinate of PacMan

      • getHpPacMan

        int getHpPacMan()
        Get PacMan's HP
        Returns:
        PacMan's HP

      • isLevelPassed

        boolean isLevelPassed()
        Return true if a level was passed last turn
        Returns:
        true if a level was passed last turn

        boolean isGameWon()
        Return true if the game is won
        Returns:
        true if the game is won

      • isPacManDead

        boolean isPacManDead()
        Return true if PacMan has no HP left (PacMan.hp = 0)
        Returns:
        true if PacMan has no HP left (PacMan.hp = 0)
